queries.description: Privileged containers lack essential security restrictions and should be avoided by removing the 'privileged' flag or by changing its value to false

spec.template.spec.containers.name=cilium-agent should not use CAP_SYS_ADMIN Linux capability
spec.template.spec.initContainers.name=mount-cgroup should not use CAP_SYS_ADMIN Linux capability
spec.template.spec.initContainers.name=clean-cilium-state should not use CAP_SYS_ADMIN Linux capability

queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{clean-cilium-state}}.volumeMounts.name={{cilium-cgroup}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{cilium-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cilium-operator}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{mount-cgroup}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{apply-sysctl-overwrites}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cilium-agent}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{mount-bpf-fs}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.
Containers should not have extra capabilities allowed

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{clean-cilium-state}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cilium-agent}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{apply-sysctl-overwrites}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{apply-sysctl-overwrites}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{mount-cgroup}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{mount-cgroup}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory
Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes
Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities
Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

'spec.template.spec.hostNetwork' should be set to false or undefined

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests
CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node
Deployments should be assigned with a PodDisruptionBudget to ensure high availability

files.expected_value: metadata.name=cilium-operator is targeted by a PodDisruptionBudget
files.actual_value: metadata.name=cilium-operator is not targeted by a PodDisruptionBudget

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations[container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/clean-cilium-state] does not specify a valid AppArmor profile
metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations[container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/mount-cgroup] does not specify a valid AppArmor profile

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{cilium-operator}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{cilium-operator}}
metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations[container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/cilium-agent] does not specify a valid AppArmor profile

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{config}}
metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations[container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/apply-sysctl-overwrites] does not specify a valid AppArmor profile

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{install-cni-binaries}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{install-cni-binaries}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{mount-bpf-fs}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{cilium}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{mount-bpf-fs}}
